#include<iostream>
using namespace std ;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false) ;
	int T ;
	cin >> T ;
	while(T--)
	{
		int N ;
		cin >> N ;
		int freq[1000001] = {0} , max = -1 ;
		for(int i = 0 ; i < N ; i++)
		{
			int a ;
			cin >> a ;
			freq[a]++ ;
			if(max < a)
				max = a ;
		}
		int ans , found = 0 ;
		for(int i = max ; i >= 1 && found == 0 ; i--)
		{
			int j = i , count = 0 , flag = 0 ;
			while(j <= max && flag == 0)
			{
				if(freq[j] > 0 && flag == 0)
					count += freq[j] ;
				j += i ;
				if(count > 1)
					flag = 1 ;
			}
			if(count > 1)
			{
				ans = i ;
				found = 1 ;
			}
		}
		cout << ans << "\n" ;
	}
}
